comments.body:
I feel it is difficult to merge this into v1.19 because it is necessary to check test stability over 2 weeks as the requirement.

/cc @oomichi

comments.body: 'discovery' is more generic, is it better to make it more specific? it is just testing the CRD storage version hash, right?
I intentionally made the file name and the framework name more general. I expected to add more tests to cover other aspects of the discovery doc, e.g., ResourceID.
